dict.acceptation: 哪里，在哪里；到哪里；某种情势或位置；

sent.orig: Where is the W.C.?; Where can I wash my hand?; Where can I add some powder?; Where is the toilet?; Where is the lavatory?; Where's the restroom?
Pick yourself up from where you fell -- correct your mistake where you made it.
sent.trans: 在哪儿跌倒就从哪儿爬起来。

sent.orig: "I know where she was!"He struck in.
sent.trans: “我知道她在哪儿！”他插嘴说道。

sent.orig: "Where is my mother ?" demanded the little girl.
sent.trans: 小女孩问道：“我的妈妈在哪里？”

sent.orig: "Where's the torn place?""It's been invisibly mended.”
